ingredients: 3   +   1/2 ounces compressed fresh yeast, 7 tablespoons milk, 5   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed, 2   +   1/4 cups unsalted butter, at room temperature, 4 tablespoons sour cream, 4 tablespoons white sugar, 2  eggs, 3  egg yolks, 1   +   1/2 cups plum jam, 2   +   1/2 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons water, or as needed
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 7g 35%, Cholesterol 53mg 18%, Sodium 9mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 3g, Calcium 14mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 47mg 1%
